Class Cannon

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.model.shipcard.ShipCard
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.model.shipcard.Cannon
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Cannon extends ShipCard
Represents a Cannon, a specialized type of ShipCard

A Cannon has a specific type, either SINGLE or DOUBLE, which defines its strength

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Cannon

      public Cannon(String id, ShipCard.Connector rightConnector, ShipCard.Connector bottomConnector, ShipCard.Connector leftConnector, Cannon.Type type)
      Constructs a Cannon with specified connectors and type. Note that the connector on the top side must be NONE
      Parameters:
      rightConnector - The connector on the right side
      bottomConnector - The connector on the bottom side
      leftConnector - The connector on the left side
      type - The type of the Cannon (SINGLE or DOUBLE)

  • Method Details

    • getType

      public Cannon.Type getType()
      Returns:
      The type of the Cannon (SINGLE or DOUBLE)

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Compares this Cannon to another object for equality

      Two Cannons are considered equal if they are of the same class, pass the equality check of the superclass, and have the same type

      Overrides:
      equals in class ShipCard
      Parameters:
      obj - The object to compare with this Cannon
      Returns:
      true if the given object is a Cannon with the same attributes, false otherwise
